item.title: ACM Multimedia 2012 Tutorials and Workshops
item.description: I attended the Tutorials “Interacting with Image Collections â€“ Visualisation and Browsing of Image Repositories” and “Continuous Analysis of Emotions for Multimedia Applications” on the first day. The last day I went to “Workshop on Audio and Multimedia Methods for Large Scale Video Analysis” and to the “Workshop on Interactive Multimedia on Mobile and Portable Devices”. This is meant as a scratchpad … I’ll add more later if I have time.
